stories.original_headline: Gray wolves are hunting sea otters and no one knows how
stories.original_summary: On a remote Alaskan island, gray wolves are rewriting the rulebook by hunting sea otters — a behavior few scientists ever expected to see. stories.fantasy_headline: Shadow-mane Wolves Hunt Fin-eared Otters on Northern Isle
stories.fantasy_story: On a faraway northern isle, the wise Sages are perplexed. They have observed the elusive shadow-mane wolves now hunting fin-eared otters, a behavior never before recorded. The Sages seek to understand this strange new custom and what it means for the balance of the land and sea realms.

stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Fish Reveal Secrets of Ageing; New Elixir Slows Wasting Sickness
stories.fantasy_story: Master Alchemists have learned much from the enchanted glimmer-fin fish, whose inner cleansing organs age swiftly. This unique creature shows how our own vital parts grow old. A potent elixir, already used for the wasting sickness, can preserve these organs, keeping adventurers hale and strong for longer.

stories.fantasy_headline: Wheel-Spinning Guild Dismisses Artisans After Launching Spirit-Bound Devices
stories.fantasy_story: The renowned Wheel-Spinning Guild has sadly announced the dismissal of many skilled artisans, especially those who crafted enchanted gears and spirit-bound devices. This comes shortly after they unveiled their latest magical creations. Guild leaders state this is part of a larger plan to manage their coffers and continue their craft into the next year.
